code: import InputModal from"../input_modal/InputModal";import TextAreaModal from"../textarea_modal/TextAreaModal";import TextButtonIcon from"../icon_text_button/TextButtonIcon";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./BotModal.scss";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BotModal(_ref){let{botId,toggleCreateBotModel,confirm,title,description}=_ref;const[titleBot,setTitleBot]=useState("");const[descriptionBot,setDescriptionBot]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{if(title){setTitleBot(title);}if(description){setDescriptionBot(description);}},[title,description]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"new_bot__modal ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"title_form",children:[botId?"Chỉnh sửa bot":"Tạo bot"," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"new_bot__modal-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputModal,{currentLength:titleBot.length,value:titleBot,onChangeInput:setTitleBot,label:"Tên bot",placeHolder:"Đặt cho bot một cái tên duy nhất",maxLength:40}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextAreaModal,{value:descriptionBot,currentLength:descriptionBot.length,onChangeInput:setDescriptionBot,label:"Mô tả chức năng bot",placeHolder:"Nhập mô tả cho bot",maxLength:350})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"new_bot__modal-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextButtonIcon,{title:"Hủy",onPress:toggleCreateBotModel,background:"#FFFFFF",color:"#1C1C1C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextButtonIcon,{title:"Xác nhận",onPress:()=>confirm(titleBot,descriptionBot,botId)})]})]})});}
